histogram.name: DiskCache.0.AsyncIOTime
histogram.summary: The time for an async IO operation to complete. This covers content Writes and Reads, measured from the cache thread.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.AsyncReadDispatchTime
histogram.summary: The synchronous portion of an async read.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.AsyncWriteDispatchTime
histogram.summary: The synchronous portion of an async write.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.AverageOpenEntries2
histogram.summary: The average number of open disk cache entries at any given time.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.BufferBytes
histogram.summary: The total size of all the internal buffers.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.ByteIORate
histogram.summary: The number of KB accessed from the cache in a 30 seconds interval.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.CreateTime
histogram.summary: The time spent creating a new entry on the cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.DeletedAge
histogram.summary: The age of the last entry on the queue of deleted entries.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.DeleteData
histogram.summary: The size of the data portion of a given entry by the time it is deleted.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.DeletedRatio
histogram.summary: The percentage of the deleted entries.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.DeleteFailed
histogram.summary: Number of external files that we were unable to delete.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.DeleteHeader
histogram.summary: The size of the HTML headers of a given entry by the time it is deleted.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.Entries
histogram.summary: The number of entries currently stored on the cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.EntriesFull
histogram.summary: The number of entries currently stored on the cache, after it is full.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.EntryAccessRate
histogram.summary: The number of entries accessed by the cache in a 30 seconds interval.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.EntrySize
histogram.summary: The average size of an entry. It is only measured after the cache is full, so evictions are taking place.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.Error
histogram.summary: Critical error ids. Reported each time the disk backed blockfile cache encounters an error or a critical error. Warning: this histogram was expired from Oct 2020 to Sep 2021; data may be missing.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.FillupAge
histogram.summary: The age of the cache (in hours) by the time we reach the size limit.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.FillupTime
histogram.summary: The number of hours required to fill up the cache, as measured by the cache being running.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.FirstByteIORate
histogram.summary: The average number of KB accessed from the cache in a 30 seconds interval, by the time we reach the cache size limit.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.FirstEntryAccessRate
histogram.summary: The average number of entries accessed by the cache in a 30 seconds interval, by the time we reach the cache size limit.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.FirstEntrySize
histogram.summary: The average size of an entry by the time we reach the cache size limit.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.FirstHighUseRatio
histogram.summary: The percentage of the entries that are highly reused, by the time we fill up the cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.FirstHitRatio
histogram.summary: The hit ratio by the time we fill up the cache. Of course, we started with an empty cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.FirstLargeEntriesRatio
histogram.summary: The percentage of the cache used by entries of more than 512 KB, by the time we reach the cache size limit.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.FirstLowUseRatio
histogram.summary: The percentage of the entries that have been reused a few times, by the time we fill up the cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.FirstNoUseRatio
histogram.summary: The percentage of the entries that have never been reused, by the time we fill up the cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.FirstResurrectRatio
histogram.summary: The percentage of re-created deleted entries versus entries that we really don't know about.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.GetRankings
histogram.summary: The time spent reading the LRU-related portion of an entry.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.HighUseAge
histogram.summary: The age of the last entry on the queue of highly used entries.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.HighUseRatio
histogram.summary: The percentage of the entries that are highly reused.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.HitRatio
histogram.summary: The current hit ratio. It is only measured after the cache is full, so evictions are taking place, and data from the fill-up period is not considered.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.HitRatioBySize2
histogram.summary: The hit ratio for each size. To calculate the hit ratio of caches of a certain size, take the ratio of a bin in this histogram to the same bin in DiskCache.0.Size2.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.HitRatioByTotalTime
histogram.summary: The hit ratio for each total time. To calculate the hit ratio of caches of a certain age, take the ratio of a bin in this histogram to the same bin in DiskCache.0.TotalTime.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.HitRatioByUseTime
histogram.summary: The hit ratio for each use time. To calculate the hit ratio of caches of a certain age, take the ratio of a bin in this histogram to the same bin in DiskCache.0.UseTime.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.IndexLoad
histogram.summary: Percentage of the index table that is currently used (the cache is full).

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.KeySize
histogram.summary: The size of each key.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.LargeEntriesRatio
histogram.summary: Percentage of the cache used by entries of more than 512 KB. It is only measured after the cache is full, so evictions are taking place.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.LowUseAge
histogram.summary: The age of the last entry on the queue of entries reused a few times.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.LowUseRatio
histogram.summary: The percentage of the entries that have been reused a few times.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.MaxOpenEntries2
histogram.summary: The maximum number of simultaneously open disk cache entries.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.MaxSize2
histogram.summary: The maximum size of the cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.NoUseAge
histogram.summary: The age of the next entry to be evicted that has never been reused.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.NoUseRatio
histogram.summary: The percentage of the entries that have never been reused.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.NumberOfReferences
histogram.summary:
The number of open entry references at any given moment.
Closely related to AverageOpenEntries, but this one is not the average per client but instead a direct histogram updated every 30 secs.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.OpenTime
histogram.summary: The time spent opening an entry already on the cache (cache hit).

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.PendingIO
histogram.summary: The number of pending IO operations (Async IO).

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.ReadTime
histogram.summary: The time spent reading from an entry.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.ResurrectRatio
histogram.summary: The percentage of re-created deleted entries versus entries that we really don't know about.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.ShortReport
histogram.summary: The reason for not sending a full report.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.Size2
histogram.summary: The current size of the cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.SparseReadTime
histogram.summary: The time spent reading from an sparse entry.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.SparseWriteTime
histogram.summary: The time spent writing to an sparse entry.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalClearTimeV1
histogram.summary: The time spent deleting the cache. (Clear browsing data).

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalClearTimeV2
histogram.summary: The time spent deleting the cache. (Clear browsing data).

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalDoomCache
histogram.summary: The number of times that this cache has been deleted by the user.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalDoomRecentEntries
histogram.summary: The number of times that the user has deleted new entries from this cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalEvictionsGaJs
histogram.summary: The number of times that ga.js was evicted.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalFatalErrors
histogram.summary: The number of fatal errors detected for this cache (so we delete everything).

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalIOTime
histogram.summary: The total time it takes to perform a payload IO operation (AKA, directed to an entry). This is measured from the IO thread.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalIOTimeRead
histogram.summary: The total time it takes to perform a read IO operation. This is emitted at each cache read, and measures from the IO thread to background thread, waiting for the disk read, and back to the IO thread.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalIOTimeWrite
histogram.summary: The total time it takes to perform a write IO operation. This is emitted at each cache read, and measures from the IO thread to background thread, optionally waiting for the disk write, and back to the IO thread.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalTime
histogram.summary: Number of hours that the cache has been used.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalTimeNotFull
histogram.summary: The number of hours that the cache has been in use, for users that still have available space.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalTrimDeletedTime
histogram.summary: The time spent removing deleted entries from the cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalTrimTime
histogram.summary: The time spent removing old entries from the cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalTrimTimeV1
histogram.summary: The time spent removing old entries from the cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalTrimTimeV2
histogram.summary: The time spent evicting entries from the cache (moving them to the deleted list).

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TrimAge
histogram.summary: The time that an entry lives in the cache without being accessed until it is finally purged.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TrimDeletedItems
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are deleted on a single iteration.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TrimItemsV1
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are evicted on a single iteration.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TrimItemsV2
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are evicted (moved to the deleted list) on a single iteration.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TrimRate
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are evicted per hour of use.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.UpdateRank
histogram.summary: The time spent moving an entry to the front of the LRU list.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.UsedSpace
histogram.summary: The percentage of the allowed disk space that we are currently using.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.UseTime
histogram.summary: Number of hours that the cache has been used since last week.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.WriteTime
histogram.summary: The time spent writing to an entry.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.AsyncIOTime
histogram.summary: The time for an async IO operation to complete. This covers content Writes and Reads, measured from the cache thread. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.AsyncReadDispatchTime
histogram.summary: The synchronous portion of an async read. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.AsyncWriteDispatchTime
histogram.summary: The synchronous portion of an async write. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.AverageOpenEntries2
histogram.summary: The average number of open disk cache entries at any given time. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.BufferBytes
histogram.summary: The total size of all the internal buffers. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.ByteIORate
histogram.summary: The number of KB accessed from the cache in a 30 seconds interval. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.DeleteHeader
histogram.summary: The size of the HTML headers of a given entry by the time it is deleted. Media-specific cache.

histogram.summary: The number of entries currently stored on the cache, after it is full. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.EntryAccessRate
histogram.summary: The number of entries accessed by the cache in a 30 seconds interval. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.EntrySize
histogram.summary: The average size of an entry. It is only measured after the cache is full, so evictions are taking place. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.Error
histogram.summary: Critical error ids. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.FillupAge
histogram.summary: The age of the cache (in hours) by the time we reach the size limit. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.FillupTime
histogram.summary: The number of hours required to fill up the cache, as measured by the cache being running. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.FirstByteIORate
histogram.summary: The average number of KB accessed from the cache in a 30 seconds interval, by the time we reach the cache size limit. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.FirstEntryAccessRate
histogram.summary: The average number of entries accessed by the cache in a 30 seconds interval, by the time we reach the cache size limit. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.FirstEntrySize

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.FirstHitRatio
histogram.summary: The hit ratio by the time we fill up the cache. Of course, we started with an empty cache. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.FirstLargeEntriesRatio
histogram.summary: The percentage of the cache used by entries of more than 512 KB, by the time we reach the cache size limit. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.GetRankings
histogram.summary: The time spent reading the LRU-related portion of an entry. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.HitRatio
histogram.summary: The current hit ratio. It is only measured after the cache is full, so evictions are taking place, and data from the fill-up period is not considered. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.HitRatioBySize2
histogram.summary: The hit ratio for each size. To calculate the hit ratio of caches of a certain size, take the ratio of a bin in this histogram to the same bin in DiskCache.2.Size2. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.HitRatioByTotalTime
histogram.summary: The hit ratio for each total time. To calculate the hit ratio of caches of a certain age, take the ratio of a bin in this histogram to the same bin in DiskCache.2.TotalTime. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.HitRatioByUseTime
histogram.summary: The hit ratio for each use time. To calculate the hit ratio of caches of a certain age, take the ratio of a bin in this histogram to the same bin in DiskCache.2.UseTime. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.IndexLoad
histogram.summary: Percentage of the index table that is currently used (the cache is full). Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.KeySize

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.LargeEntriesRatio
histogram.summary: Percentage of the cache used by entries of more than 512 KB. It is only measured after the cache is full, so evictions are taking place. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.MaxOpenEntries2
histogram.summary: The maximum number of simultaneously open disk cache entries. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.MaxSize2
histogram.summary: The maximum size of the cache. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.NumberOfReferences
histogram.summary: The number of open entry references at any given moment. Closely related to AverageOpenEntries, but this one is not the average per client but instead a direct histogram updated every 30 secs. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.OpenTime
histogram.summary: The time spent opening an entry already on the cache (cache hit). Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.PendingIO
histogram.summary: The number of pending IO operations (Async IO). Media-specific cache.

histogram.summary: The current size of the cache. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.TotalClearTimeV1
histogram.summary: The time spent deleting the cache. (Clear browsing data). Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.TotalClearTimeV2
histogram.summary: The time spent deleting the cache. (Clear browsing data). Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.TotalIOTime
histogram.summary: The total time it takes to perform a payload IO operation (AKA, directed to an entry). This is measured from the IO thread. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.TotalTime
histogram.summary: Number of hours that the cache has been used. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.TotalTrimDeletedTime
histogram.summary: The time spent removing deleted entries from the cache. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.TotalTrimTime
histogram.summary: The time spent removing old entries from the cache. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.TotalTrimTimeV1
histogram.summary: The time spent removing old entries from the cache. Media-specific cache.

histogram.summary: The time spent evicting entries from the cache (moving them to the deleted list). Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.TrimAge
histogram.summary: The time that an entry lives in the cache without being accessed until it is finally purged. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.TrimDeletedItems
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are deleted on a single iteration. Media-specific cache.

histogram.summary: The number of entries that are evicted on a single iteration. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.TrimItemsV2
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are evicted (moved to the deleted list) on a single iteration. Media-specific cache.

histogram.summary: The time spent moving an entry to the front of the LRU list. Media-specific cache.

histogram.summary: The percentage of the allowed disk space that we are currently using. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.UseTime
histogram.summary: Number of hours that the cache has been used since last week. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.2.WriteTime
histogram.summary: The time spent writing to an entry. Media-specific cache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.3.TrimAge
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time that an entry lives in the cache without being accessed until it is finally purged. AppCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.3.TrimDeletedItems
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are deleted on a single iteration. AppCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.3.TrimItemsV1
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are evicted on a single iteration. AppCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.3.TrimItemsV2
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are evicted (moved to the deleted list) on a single iteration. AppCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.3.TrimRate
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are evicted per hour of use. AppCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.3.UpdateRank
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time spent moving an entry to the front of the LRU list. AppCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.3.UsedSpace
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The percentage of the allowed disk space that we are currently using. AppCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.3.UseTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Number of hours that the cache has been used since last week. AppCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.3.WriteTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time spent writing to an entry. AppCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.AsyncIOTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time for an async IO operation to complete. This covers content Writes and Reads, measured from the cache thread. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.AsyncReadDispatchTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The synchronous portion of an async read. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.AsyncWriteDispatchTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The synchronous portion of an async write. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.AverageOpenEntries2
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The average number of open disk cache entries at any given time. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.BufferBytes
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The total size of all the internal buffers. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.ByteIORate
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of KB accessed from the cache in a 30 seconds interval. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.CreateTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time spent creating a new entry on the cache. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.DeleteData
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The size of the data portion of a given entry by the time it is deleted. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.DeleteFailed
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Number of external files that we were unable to delete. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.DeleteHeader
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The size of the HTML headers of a given entry by the time it is deleted. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.Entries
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of entries currently stored on the cache. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.EntriesFull
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of entries currently stored on the cache, after it is full. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.EntryAccessRate
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of entries accessed by the cache in a 30 seconds interval. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.EntrySize
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The average size of an entry. It is only measured after the cache is full, so evictions are taking place. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.Error
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Critical error ids. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.FillupAge
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The age of the cache (in hours) by the time we reach the size limit. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.FillupTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of hours required to fill up the cache, as measured by the cache being running. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.FirstByteIORate
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The average number of KB accessed from the cache in a 30 seconds interval, by the time we reach the cache size limit. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.FirstEntryAccessRate
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The average number of entries accessed by the cache in a 30 seconds interval, by the time we reach the cache size limit. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.FirstEntrySize
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The average size of an entry by the time we reach the cache size limit. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.FirstHitRatio
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The hit ratio by the time we fill up the cache. Of course, we started with an empty cache. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.FirstLargeEntriesRatio
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The percentage of the cache used by entries of more than 512 KB, by the time we reach the cache size limit. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.GetRankings
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time spent reading the LRU-related portion of an entry. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.HitRatio
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The current hit ratio. It is only measured after the cache is full, so evictions are taking place, and data from the fill-up period is not considered. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.HitRatioBySize2
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The hit ratio for each size. To calculate the hit ratio of caches of a certain size, take the ratio of a bin in this histogram to the same bin in DiskCache.4.Size2. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.HitRatioByTotalTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The hit ratio for each total time. To calculate the hit ratio of caches of a certain age, take the ratio of a bin in this histogram to the same bin in DiskCache.4.TotalTime. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.HitRatioByUseTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The hit ratio for each use time. To calculate the hit ratio of caches of a certain age, take the ratio of a bin in this histogram to the same bin in DiskCache.4.UseTime. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.IndexLoad
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Percentage of the index table that is currently used (the cache is full). ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.KeySize
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The size of each key. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.LargeEntriesRatio
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Percentage of the cache used by entries of more than 512 KB. It is only measured after the cache is full, so evictions are taking place. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.MaxOpenEntries2
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The maximum number of simultaneously open disk cache entries. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.MaxSize2
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The maximum size of the cache. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.OpenTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time spent opening an entry already on the cache (cache hit). ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.PendingIO
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of pending IO operations (Async IO). ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.ReadTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time spent reading from an entry. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.ShortReport
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The reason for not sending a full report. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.Size
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The current size of the cache. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.TotalIOTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The total time it takes to perform a payload IO operation (AKA, directed to an entry). This is measured from the IO thread. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.TotalTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Number of hours that the cache has been used. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.TotalTrimTimeV1
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time spent removing old entries from the cache. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.TrimAge
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time that an entry lives in the cache without being accessed until it is finally purged. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.TrimItemsV1
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are evicted on a single iteration. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.TrimRate
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The number of entries that are evicted per hour of use. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.UpdateRank
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time spent moving an entry to the front of the LRU list. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.UsedSpace
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The percentage of the allowed disk space that we are currently using. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.UseTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Number of hours that the cache has been used since last week. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.4.WriteTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The time spent writing to an entry. ShaderCache.

histogram.name: DiskCache.DeleteFailed2
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Number of block-files that we were unable to delete.

histogram.name: DiskCache.Experiment
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: The experiment group for this user.

histogram.name: DiskCache.SizeStats
